subject: Simsonn VAM
description_text:
Hi,

I recently purchased two Vam motors to use in my Plus X pedal control box
(Order #SSN1729)
.
I installed the beta version of SimHub and was able to add a new device.
But the Vams don't work in SimHub tests or in IRAcing. They're connected in
SimHub Manager, but SimHub says "searching device."

Can you help me? Here are the screenshots.

[image: WhatsApp Image 2025-07-09 at 23.26.51.jpeg]
[image: WhatsApp Image 2025-07-09 at 23.26.40.jpeg][image: WhatsApp Image
2025-07-09 at 23.26.39.jpeg]

conversations.body_text: Hi Iago Leal,  Please update your SIMHUB software to version 9.9.3 to resolve the issue.Â
